sen.j: 一時紀州藩徳川頼宣に仕えたが、後に徳川秀忠の命によって幕府御用となり、江戸時代には観世流の座付きとして活躍した。
sen.e: The school once served for Yorinubu Tokugawa of Kishu domain, but it later became the retainer of bakufu at the behest of Hidetada TOKUGAWA and actively performed as the accompanist of Kanze-ryu school during the Edo period.
